summary:
Ever think that bows in skyrim have a painfully short range? Ever wanted to fire a bow further than a Snipar rifle? Then this mods for you! with this mod you can actually perform a 360 noscope from haafingar to the rift and impress da bitcheses with your sick mlg gamer skills
<br />Bon apetit
<br />
<br />S
descriptionHtml:
Ever think that bows in skyrim have a painfully short range? Ever wanted to fire a bow further than a Snipar rifle? Then this mods for you! with this mod you can actually perform a 360 noscope from haafingar to the rift and impress da bitcheses with your sick mlg gamer skills 
Bon apetit 

Sorry if it's shit, I'm not a very good modder.
author: That Random Welsh Kid
